refnamediv.refpurpose: Synthesis by additive synthesis and inverse FFT. Experimental and only available as source code at the moment.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in cuda. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Synthesis by additive synthesis and inverse FFT.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: asig cudasynth kamp, kfreq, itab, iftab, iatab[, inum]
asig cudasynth fsig, kamp, kfreq[, inum]
